data.text: @delusionalxtay @triflinhobitch that too. personally i enjoy talking about my friends and family who’ve passed, remembering the shit we got into and experiences we’ve had together. other people get mad when i bring them up bc they don’t wanna think about them. but that’s exactly it we all grieve differently
@kathryncurrier1 @triflinhobitch i honestly just think the internet shouldn’t be telling people how to fucking grieve

@triflinhobitch WAS LITERALLY THINKIKG THIS EXACT THING. clearly they’ve never experienced death in a way like that before. also not to mention she left him for the right reasons for herself. that doesn’t mean she didn’t still care or love him. i’ve literally been blocking everyone whos said tht

@delusionalxtay True the fuck that. Plus didn’t they break up not bc they didnt love each other but bc of problems affecting the relationship? It’s like people think if you break up you dont love each other and once it’s over u never think about them again

@triflinhobitch right like i’ve been a fan for YEARS and I get how it could be frustrating? but just because they broke up before he passed doesn’t mean what they had was never there.  If he passed a different way people wouldn’t say anything about it tho so ☕️
